job.title: Front End Web Developer
job.description: We are looking for a FrontEnd Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming Responsibilities will include translation of the UIUX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application You will work with the design team and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it worksltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtMust live in Los Angeles No relocation or visa sponsorship is available for this positionltligt ltligt3 years experience in converting graphical content to HTML5 responsive desktop and mobileready websiteappsltligt ltligtProficient understanding of crossbrowser compatibility issues and ways to work around themltligt ltligtComfortable taking PSD AI andor Sketch files and creating HTMLCSSJavaScript renditionsltligt ltligtAn eye for the graphical integrity of the original design is requiredltligt ltligtSolid working knowledge of HTML5 CSS SASS Bootstrap3 ampamp 4 and knowledge of the DOMltligt ltligtExperience with jQuery Angula5 or other JavaScript frameworks would be helpfulltligt ltligtComfortable working closely with both the graphics provider and the development teamltligt ltligtMust understand responsive design and have the ability to optimize a design for all devicesltligt ltligtHave the desire and ability to mentor other team members to establish a good team environmentltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltugtltstronggtBenefitsltbrgtltstronggtltugtltulgtltligtThis will be a contract positionltligtltulgt
